授業方法: This is a seminar.  All students must complete all required readings prior to each class and must complete weekly assignments before and after classes.

トピック.授業計画1:
In the first semester, we will critically read research and other papers done by students and experts so as to develop an understanding of essential components of academic research. Every week there will be reading and presentation assignments.

Weekly topics

1. Introduction
2. Case Study 1: research theme
3. Case Study 2: Defining the Issues and Significance
4. Case Study 3: Universe and Samples
5. Case Study 4: Mapping Variables
6. Case Study 5: Research Methodology
7. Case Study 6: Literature Review 1
8. Case Study 7: Literature Review 2
9. Case Study 8: Data Collection
10. Case Study 9: Data Analysis 1
11. Case Study 10: Data Analysis 2
12. Case Study 11: Overall Organization
13. Case Study 12 Conclusion
14. Course Review and Evaluation
トピック.授業外学習2: Each students must decide a research topic in the first semester and make a research proposal by the end of the 2nd semester.
